msg: [MJAR-7] Adding parameter to control the creation of JAR files
o adding the forceCreation parameter to the mojo

the element in the plugin configuration would be of the form
So that the use of -Djar.forceCreation couldn't clash with any other expression for cli use.
Will post to the list but I changed the parameter to conform.
